: : KroniK : :

Wrath and Crush are still sitting outside the nWo base on r=
ocks, chatting about miscellaneous topics.

Wrath:  You know, I really can'=
t tell you how happy I am to be a part  of the New World Order.  I wasn't e=
xpecting this at all, and now I am so into it.

Crush nods in agreement.  H=
e replies.

Crush:  Damn straight!  I don't know about you, but this growin=
g faction feels a hell of a lot like a close family.

Wrath:  Oh good, I'm =
not the only one who feels that way.  It's also good to be off Cybertron.  =
The Transformer home is just a big ball of bullshit now.  You know, sometim=
es I-

Suddenly, Wrath pauses when he hears something in the vicinity.  Cru=
sh heard it too.  Both of them instinctively rise to their feet, weapons dr=
awn.

Crush:  If somebody's there, please show yourself without hostility, =
and think twice before opening fire.

-------------------------------------=
-------------------------------------------------
The preceding announcemen=
t has been paid for by the 
New World Order
